hero.headline: Find Your Dream Home in Austin
hero.subheadline: #1 Rated Real Estate Team • 500+ Homes Sold • Local Market Experts

about.title: Your Trusted Austin Real Estate Partner
about.text: Sarah Mitchell and her team at Premier Realty Austin have helped over 500 families find their perfect home since 2012. With deep knowledge of Austin's diverse neighborhoods - from downtown condos to Hill Country estates - we guide buyers and sellers through every step of the transaction. Our data-driven approach and skilled negotiation have saved our clients millions.

services.name: Buyer Representation
services.description: Expert guidance from first showing to closing. We find homes before they hit the market.

services.name: Seller Services
services.description: Strategic pricing, professional staging, and aggressive marketing to sell fast and for top dollar.

services.name: Investment Properties
services.description: Identify high-ROI rental properties and multi-family investments in Austin's growing market.

services.name: Relocation Services
services.description: Moving to Austin? We'll help you find the right neighborhood, schools, and lifestyle fit.

testimonials.name: Kevin & Amanda L.
testimonials.content: Sarah found us our dream home in a competitive market. We were outbid twice before, but her strategy won us the third offer!

testimonials.name: The Henderson Family
testimonials.content: Sold our home in 5 days for $30,000 over asking. Premier Realty's marketing was incredible.

testimonials.name: Dr. James P.
testimonials.content: Relocated from Chicago for work. Sarah helped me understand Austin neighborhoods and find the perfect spot. Seamless experience.
